fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who visit you or infected players become infected. 
- Players who infected players visit become infected.
- If, at the end of the phase, all other players are infected, you will become Post 94: Pestilence, Horseman of the Apocalypse. When you do, the Town will be informed that a plague has consumed the Town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Infect all living players and win as Pestilence.
